fields.name: Customer Support:
fields.value: Any time anyone asks a clarifying question about their role in day chat, factional chat, or DMs with the host, the question will be forwarded for you to answer. You may request the player's exact role, evening feedback, and night feedback as needed. You will be granted access to all factional chats. You or the host will reply with the explanation you provide.

fields.name: Net Promoter Score (NPS):
fields.value: Each time you answer a question, you must ask the player to rate how likely they are to refer a friend to MafiaTWOW on a scale of 1-10. If you fail to reply to a question within 12 hours of submission, this counts as a rating of 0.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: Answer at least ten questions and achieve an average NPS rating of at least 8.10 (rounded to the nearest hundredth).
